article: ## HTML5 Displaying Images ### Introduction HTML5 provides a powerful way to display images on web pages. This documentation will guide you through the process of displaying images using HTML5. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on how to display images on web pages using HTML5. The scope of this documentation includes the necessary requirements and pre-requisites, code snippets and commands, troubleshooting and common issues, as well as best practices and recommendations. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To display images using HTML5, you will need the following: - A text editor or an integrated development environment (IDE) - An internet browser - Image files in a supported format (such as JPEG, PNG, or GIF) ### Step-by-Step Instructions Follow these steps to display images using HTML5: 1. Create a new HTML file or open an existing one in your text editor or IDE. 2. Open the HTML file in your internet browser.
